Synopsis
Hank Palmer (Robert Downey Jr.), a leading lawyer, returns home after the death of his mother. He then learns that his father (Robert Duvall), who is the judge of the people and who is estranged, is suspected of having committed a crime. His decision to investigate the case is being gradually restore a relationship that was broken with yours.

2014: Satellite Awards: 2 nominations including Best Actor (Duvall)
